title: The standard scholarly edition of Smith’s works is published in hardcover by Oxford University Press and paperback by the Liberty Fund. Known as the Glasgow Edition, this version includes Smith’s correspondence and student notes of his courses on rhe­toric and jurisprudence as well as critical editions of his published texts
